articles.title: Fairbanc provides BNPL for micro-merchants in Indonesia
articles.description: “Buy now, pay later” (BNPL) startups have gained traction by targeting consumers, but BNPLs for businesses are also starting to take off. One example is Fairbanc, which is based in Singapore but focused on Indonesia. It allows small businesses to take out short-term credit to purchase fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) inventory. Fairbanc announced today it […]

articles.title: Explainer: Luton Airport runway meltdown shows airports vulnerable to climate change
